item.title: LD DIALOGUE: Bruce Pardy & Andrew DeBartolo - The "Liberty" People v. The "Virtue" People [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ September 06, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, host Andrew DeBartolo sat down with Law professor Bruce Pardy to discuss the difference between what he calls the "virtue people" and the "liberty people." You're not going to want to miss this extended discussion on law, liberty, and ethics. Enjoy!

Episode Resources:
Rights Probe Website: https://www.rightsprobe.org/;
"Anatomy of the Administrative State" | Brownstone Institute: https://brownstone.org/articles/anatomy-of-the-administrative-state/;

item.title: EXPOSING the Demonic Heartbeat of the Western Marxist Death-cult [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ August 29, 2024
In this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty expose the heart of the demonic Marxist death-cult that has bewitched Western Civilization. Love God; hate death! Not the other way 'round.

Segment 1 - News Brief:
"Rebel News Successfully Lifts Publication Bans on Jonathan Yaniv Court Hearings" | Rebel News:
https://www.rebelnews.com/rebel_news_successfully_lifts_publication_bans_on_jonathan_yaniv_court_hearings;
"British Columbia Venue Cancels Feminist Event Opposing Gender Ideology After Pressure from LGBT Activists" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/british-columbia-venue-cancels-feminist-event-opposing-gender-ideology-after-pressure-from-lgbt-activists;
Trans Advantage Clip from Triggernometry | via Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/reel/337948095954201;
"Arbitrator Awards Compensation to Toronto Health Care Workers Dismissed for Refusing COVID Vaccine" | The Epoch Times: https://www.theepochtimes.com/world/arbitrator-awards-compensation-to-toronto-health-care-workers-dismissed-for-refusing-covid-vaccine-5710123;
"Article on British Politics" | BBC News
https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cx2g921rd2lo?s=09;

Segment 2 :
"Quebec Study Reveals Over 10% of Babies Aborted in Second Trimester Are Born Alive" | LifeSiteNews:
https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/quebec-study-reveals-over-10-of-babies-aborted-in-second-trimester-are-born-alive;
"'Rip Off a Leg or Two': Undercover Video Exposes How Planned Parenthood Harvests Baby Organs" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/rip-off-a-leg-or-two-undercover-video-exposes-how-planned-parenthood-harvests-baby-organs;
"89-Year-Old Death Camp Survivor, 6 Other Pro-Lifers Face 10 Years in Prison on FACE Act Charges" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/89-year-old-death-camp-survivor-6-other-pro-lifers-face-10-years-in-prison-on-face-act-charges;
"45% of Women Estimated to Be Single and Childless by 2030" | Medium: https://medium.com/the-savanna-post/45-of-women-estimated-to-be-single-and-childless-by-2030-1faf959b26cf;
"Abortion's Killer Angel" | Theotivity Podcast: https://www.theotivity.com/podcast/055-abortions-killer-angel-the-dark-story-of-planned-parenthoods-margaret-sanger/;
Killer Angel by Dr. George Grant: https://canonpress.com/products/killer-angel?srsltid=AfmBOoqnwdekGLmeLUXTB145vy9Lvk4efd4j60-P4vIxEzBBQ7BSWKLc; 

Segment 3:
"No One Can Figure Out Why the Atlantic Ocean Is Cooling at Record Speed" | BGR: https://bgr.com/science/no-one-can-figure-out-why-the-atlantic-ocean-is-cooling-at-record-speed;
"Ottawa Pride Calls Out Islamophobia, Pink-Washing in Solidarity with Gaza Ahead of Parade" | The Post Millennial:
https://thepostmillennial.com/ottawa-pride-calls-out-islamophobia-pink-washing-in-solidarity-with-gaza-ahead-of-parade;
"Anti-Semitic Group Targets Hundreds of Jewish Sites Across Canada with Threats of a 'Pool of Blood'" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/anti-semitic-group-targets-hundreds-of-jewish-sites-across-canada-with-threats-of-a-pool-of-blood;
Woman Chraged for Silently Praying Near an Abortion Clinic | Tweet by @wolsned: https://x.com/wolsned/status/1822403356981133426.
